name: streamur
author: Julien Dreux <julien.dreux@gmail.com> (www.juliendreux.com); Thomas Getgood <thomas.getgood@gmail.com>, StephenHamilton, ben-zen
description: A modular, general purpose stream manager started for the summer Blast-off Hackathon, Saturday, June 23, 2012, Montreal, QC, Canada, completed & released as an asset manager by Julien Dreux.
